SELECT ieb.id, h.`name` hostelName, ieb.content, ieb.amount, ieb.bill_type billType, ieb.spend_time spendTime, cio.source_id sourceId, cio.living_num livingNum, cio.`names` personNames, cio.check_in_date checkInDate, cio.check_out_date checkOutDate, ieb.create_time createTime FROM T_INCOME_EXPENDITURE_BILL ieb JOIN V_PERMISSION_P_H one ON ieb.hostel_id = one.hostel_id AND one.person_id = #{personId} JOIN T_HOSTEL h ON ieb.hostel_id = h.id LEFT JOIN T_CHECK_IN_ORDER cio ON ieb.id = cio.id
h.id IN (${checkIds})
AND ieb.spend_time >= #{startDate} AND ieb.spend_time <= #{endDate} # AND ieb.spend_time BETWEEN ${startDate} AND ${endDate}
ORDER BY ieb.spend_time asc,ieb.id asc,ieb.create_time asc
LIMIT 0,10
LIMIT ${10 * page},10
